sentence.Network_en: Three cannabis plants were found by eagle-eyed police officers.

sentence.Network_en: Her wide-eyed innocence soon exposes the pretensions of the art world.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的天真烂漫很快就暴露了艺术界的矫揉造作。
